items.name: Taival Advisory Oy
items.description: Taival is delivering the next generation of business, strategy and technology advisory services. We believe a strong core team combined with a wide and deep ecosystem of partners can deliver leading-edge business and technology services to both corporations and start-up companies.

items.name: ProLocalis Oy
items.shortDescription: Connecting consumers to the best local products
items.description: ProLocalis connects consumers to local producers of food, beverages, and tourism experiences

items.name: KYKLOS
items.shortDescription: Enabling gamers to find the perfect teammates
items.description:
Available in France and in the Nordics, KYKLOS is enabling gamers to find the perfect teammates to enter the amateur esport scene. 
We design a technical and a psychological profile for each user and then automatically push the most relevant profiles to create the best multiplayer experience on the market. Once the team is created, we reward the played time and the performance with a virtual currency which will be spent on our marketplace into discounts on different items.

items.name: Holda Technologies Oy
items.description: Riskmanagement tool for investors

items.name: Molnix Oy
items.shortDescription: Molnix Rapid Personnel Manager for humanitarian HR
items.description: Is your personnel roster still in a spreadsheet? Molnix Rapid Personnel Manager brings proper HR tools to roster management for humanitarian organizations. With it, you can alert the right people in under 60 seconds. By automating and offloading many parts of Human Resource Management, it saves you time and money. We have proven the benefits in operation with the Finnish Red Cross. It is cloud based, available immediately, and works on desktop and mobile. 100% owned by us, but open for angels.

items.name: Seloy Live Oy
items.description:
Seloy Live is providing customized interactive glass surfaces that enable immersive augmented customer experiences.

SENSE - Augmented Interactive Window gives exceptional experiences; Interaction is the key to brand engagement and customer engagement is everything. With Seloy Live SENSE you can make your brand really stand out. SENSE is a state-of-the-art combination of a transparent insulating glass unit and an interactive touch surface, available in any size up to 3 x 6 meters.

items.name: Surgify Medical Oy
items.description: In many fields of surgery and dentistry, bone has to be cut or removed without damaging the proximal soft structures. Surgify develops new solutions to protect these structures and prevent associated complications. Bleeding, infections and nerve injuries are some of the complications that can severely affect a patients quality of life. Surgify technology improves the safety, speed and precision of bone surgery to minimize these risks.

items.name: Koru
items.shortDescription: Graphics OS platform for beautiful user experience
items.description:
* Our Vision is that touch experiences will spread everywhere.
!  Our mission is to empower brands to deliver unique user experience to their fans.
€ Featured on millions of smart watches available globally.
# We enable high-end user experience on low-cost HW. 
# We require 1000X less RAM than Wear OS for similar experience. 

€ Cashflow profitable 30+ world-class experts. 30% most experienced craftsmen have 40.000h of professional C-development skills.

items.name: Infinited Fiber Company Oy
items.description:
IFC's process technology can turn textile, cardboard and agricultural waste to new and better cotton and not only once but infinitely without compromising in quality and comfort. I

FC is running industrial pilot production in Espoo Finland since March 2018 and the material have been successfully proven by major brands and their present supply chain partners. IFC's revenue 2018 is € 1,4 million from fiber deliveries and prelicense product sales.

items.name: Viimatech Digital Oy
items.shortDescription: Viimatech is the cost leader in pump monitoring.
items.description:
Unique solution to optimize pumps and enable 1 000 000 000 EUR energy and maintenance cost savings in Europe with 30% costs to traditional systems. Extensive, scalable and easy to use solution is based to mathematical methods and cost optimized electronics.
Traction is proven in POC projects in water utilities and process industry. Team combines experience from global tech. business, university science and daily maintenance tasks.
A-round investment 2 MEUR in end 2019 for globalization.

items.name: Sensmet Oy
items.shortDescription: We let you see the quality of water in new light!
items.description:
Water is set to become the new oil as water scarcity spreads. Understanding the water quality continuously is the key for optimizing the water usage in industry and to prevent pollution.

This can be done with our TWA - Total Water Analyser™ technology, which lets customer truly understand the quality of the water – realtime. 

7 (years University R&D) + 4 (fulltime employees) + 1 (year as startup) = 200 000 (first year revenue)

We are looking 300k€ investment for market segmentation and entry.

items.name: SkenarioLabs Oy
items.description:
We tell property owners, investors and financial institutes where to invest.

Our platform tells you where to put your money to manage both the value and the costs meaning future repairs and maintenance of your real-estate. Both residential and commercial. E.g. if you’re looking at 20000 units in your portfolio and you have a budget to invest in half… which units should you choose and why?

items.name: Dailuge Inc.
items.shortDescription: Ohjaa knows what a Chinese traveller wants.
items.description:
For the first time, a Chinese traveller sitting in his couch at his Xi ´An home can discuss his travel plan `face to face ` with another Chinese standing by a window in his Reykjavik house. For the next 10 minutes, he might decide to talk with someone in Paris. Ohjaa is the first face-2-face trip planning service in the world.

Ohjaa engages 200+ Hosts and the Network covers 17 cities across Europe. We will cover all major European cities with 1000+ Hosts by the end of 2019.

items.name: ANAXEOS
items.shortDescription: Pet wearables. The Next multi-billion dollar market.
items.description:
Best Shared Life with Dogs.
 
Reflects the mutual value data and technological advancements can offer for dogs and people living and working with them.

items.name: BOARDIO
items.description: Boardio connects companies with skilled individuals available for advisory work. Boardio has a global pool of over 2000 candidates with skills and availability for advisory and board positions. Companies needing external advisors can post an recruitment ad for free and let interested advisors apply. Companies can also browse advisor base and contact the ones that seem to have skills needed. Using Boardio is free for both companies and individuals. Premium packages are also available.

items.name: RF SensIT
items.description: Sensors for monitoring moisture in building structures.

items.name: BroadBit Batteries Oy
items.description: BroadBit has developed a novel low-cost/high-performance/robust/eco-friendly/scalable sodium chloride battery technology with 50% more energy per unit cost and 25% more energy per unit mass as lithium-ion. We are now seeking funders and partners to help us commercialize the technology for applications in electric vehicles, portable electronics and grid stabilization.

items.name: 360Visualizer Oy
items.description:
Visualizer drives hotels’ sales by filling unused meetings and events capacity.

Visualizer Engage & Sell is a B2B software tool, which includes content management, distribution, and analytics. It is delivered as a service from the cloud via a web and mobile user interface. It is sold to hotels and venues and subscriptions are billed annually.

items.name: Desentum Oy
items.description: Desentum is a research-oriented biopharmaceutical company specialized in developing novel types of allergen immunotherapy products that are based on switching the immune system's response to allergens from hypersensitivity to tolerance. We have a unique approach for designing the hypoallergens used in immunotherapy.

items.name: Paptic Oy
items.description: Paptic is unique combination of benefits of paper, plastics and textiles. It is extending the market of packaging papers and replacing plastics through technical performance and it is the only plastic replacing material which is recyclable in paper recycling, directly suitable for plastic converting machines and providing textile-like quality experience.

items.name: Smidyo
items.description:
Small Businesses that sell a complex product, such as manufacturing, or a service, spend a lot of time calculation quotes. 

That's why we have created an easy to use SaaS that allows the business owner to set up a self-service quotation portal for their customers.

We offer the low barrier of entry of something like Shopify, but the flexibility of an otherwise expensive bespoke system.

items.name: Oppi AI Oy
items.shortDescription: We develop an AI-based technology for education
items.description: We use recent advances in AI to create a technology that makes education personalized, help teachers and learners enjoy new education, more effective and efficient.

items.name: ICEYE Oy
items.description: ICEYE is the first organization in the world to successfully launch synthetic-aperture radar (SAR) satellites with 20-fold weight savings and is the World’s leading company in miniaturized SAR technology. ICEYE empowers others to make better decisions in governmental and commercial industries by providing access to timely and reliable satellite imagery. The company is tackling this crucial lack of actionable information with world-first aerospace capabilities and a New Space approach.

items.name: Wizense Oy
items.description:
Wizense has specialized providing leading industrial IoT solutions from sensors, gateway connectivity, analytics pipelines, serverless backends to mobile applications.

Contact us for more information: info@wizense.com or call +358 40 8031910

items.name: Teraloop Oy
items.description: As global demand for energy continues to grow we need to tackle three main challenges; improving the integration of renewable energies, reducing energy losses and increasing large scale energy storage. Furthermore, we need to oversee the future where we need to be 100% powered by renewable assets, we need to have our grid security designed to withstand heavy drops and loads of renewable energy, also to have a response system to react to rapid load demand from consumers and industries.

items.name: GIM Oy
items.shortDescription: Leading mobile robotics company in EU
items.description: Gim is the leading mobile robotics company in EU. With our laser based navigation and control system any indoor or outdoor ground vehicle can be automated. System has been proved in several applications from indoor logistics to autonomous cars and forest machinery.

items.name: Emergence Oy
items.shortDescription: Taival maintenance free location tracking solution
items.description: Taival, GSM based location tracking solution.  Our biggest advantage is totally maintenance free device. No need to replace or re-charge batteries for ever. Our customers can reduce the amount of their assets by 20% or sell their service 20% efficiently. We are tracking our customers containers, skips, truck trailers, buoys, train vehicles and small machinery. We will offer mobile application and web user interface to manage assets. Or we can connect data into customers IT-system via REST-API

items.name: EEE Innovations Oy
items.description:
Our solutions eGRIP and eDAS aggregate data from vehicles and third-party sources to cloud where it is analyzed as real-time slipperiness, vehicle, driving style and traffic flow optimization information. The refined data is then sold to various third-party sources as insurance companies and logistics companies. 
The solution is scalable (SaaS) service for transporters, public transportation, logistics and road maintenance operators. We are looking for funding for geographical expansion.

items.name: LUOTSI

items.name: Liikennevirta Oy
items.description: We bring electric vehicles into peoples everyday life and as a part of energy system

items.description: As the central source of information of your IT inventory, Replex provides full transparency throughout your infrastructure, independent of the underlying technology. items.name: BackedByCFO Oy

items.name: Wowanders
items.shortDescription: World's smartest travel diary & sharing platform
items.description:
Wowanders automatically turns your trips into diaries and makes it easy to share recommendations on hotels, restaurants & sights with friends. By automating content creation we fundamentally change how people can share experiences.
Our revenues come from booking commissions and we're aiming at 45M€ revenues  in 2021.
In few months after soft-launching we already had 5 000 downloads and users had added 2500 trips.
We have gathered so far 200K€ financing, and next step is 500-800K€ seed round.

items.name: Cozify Oy
items.description:
Cozify makes smart devices play together. Cozify connects smart devices from different manufacturers into one seamlessly working entity. It provides a single application to control and automate homes and buildings – taking care of security, energy saving and comfort.

Cozify is already a popular end-user product and we have traction in partner sales. Our main goal is to offer a platform for other enterprises to make their own smart living offering.

items.description:

Business Model 
Industry/Market: Composite manufacturer for Automotive, Sports, Aerospace, Wind

Totally new way of producing solar cells.

Our tethered industrial UAV fitted with robotic arms is able to perform high-precision work at heights in inaccessible areas.
Designed with rugged industrial components that have proven their value in industry, it can carry heavy weights (up to 100kg).

Our solution consists of the Navigil S1/S3 mobile telehealthcare wristwatches with mobile phone, GPS tracking and activity monitoring features supported by mobile communication, location and Navigil Rafael management services which enable blended care model and optimal use of scarce care resources. Up to 30% of healthcare cost can be avoided with preventive care of elderly persons.

Spe3dLab is involved in various proof of concept projects in the following fields: reanimation, hospital hygiene, ambulatory as well as forensic medicine units and in a mutual insurance project.

It has been tested in harsh Finnish winter conditions. Our automation system is platform free and can convert cars and other vehicles to automated ones so that they can be driven driverless.

Benefits:
- Handling receipts with one application
- An easy way to handle receipts
- Transferring receipts to accounting softwares in real-time

How to use

- Link payment/loyalty card
- Make purchases and receive e-receipt automatically

items.name: Ambronite Oy

Our mission at Ambronite is to help urban professionals to thrive and live life to the fullest with healthy food products.

Ambronite has customers in over 30 countries and has been covered by e.g. TIME Magazine, Wired, Wallpaper and Business Insider.

items.name: RoadCloud Oy
items.description:
Providing road information that matters - way ahead
With dedicated hardware installed into carefully selected fleets of vehicles, we collect data that matters. The data is refined into information products providing unique opportunities for our customers and fleet partners.Working on autonomous driving, road maintenance or traffic information systems? See how you can benefit from our services!

items.name: Celltrum Oy

Our target users are professionals that need to carry or pick up and return hundreds of keys to get their job done. Stanley Security has invested in us and we are doing projects together but we are looking for 1-2 MEUR investment to speed up our development and growth.

Everything behind an easy user interface that anyone can use. If you have CAD models, 3D or 360 content and are looking for easy ways to share and deploy, then this one is for you.

Our happy customers in 45+ countries include activity parks, indoor playgrounds, climbing and fitness gyms for whom our products are a unique experience in a compact space.

items.name: Privaon Oy

We are a globally recognized specialist and software company in the fields of Privacy and Data Protection. We help our customers and provide solutions in the areas of Privacy Risk Management and Privacy Engineering. We provide our customers the tools for risk assessments and privacy management along with various consultation services.

Our guiding principle “Privacy does not prevent cool things from happening” leads us in everything we do!

items.name: Deal Room Events Oy
items.description: Deal Room is a platform that gets people to meet for making deals. A meeting scheduling tool allowing participants to organise one to one meetings among themselves.

* Surveying: topographical, geophysical  
* Surveillance: search & rescue, border control  
* Telecommunications: Satellite like service with increased mobility

items.name: ViiBE
items.shortDescription: The technology of visioassistance without download
items.description:
ViiBE helps industrial technical support and after sales services operate the best remote diagnosis, reduce experts' displacements, optimize first contact resolution rates and improve technicians and customers' satisfaction through a remote assistance experience.
Our Web application enables experts to see incidents in real time through the back camera of the interlocutor's smartphone, snap and share images or any document, draw on them, guide with augmented reality features and much more.

items.name: everynet
items.description: Everynet is a leading Low Power Wide Area (LPWA) technology network operator with access to networks around the globe including the Americas, EMEA, and APAC.

items.name: Puheet.com

To make optimal business decisions, one must understand customer needs, wants and desires. Invite your stakeholders to co-create and utilize all other textual feedback. 
Our solution has tools to build and manage an online community, create surveys, maintain discussions, and to present ideas with images, videos, and text. 
You get state-of-the-art analytics, insights, nice visuals and best of the breed natural language processing tools.
An example application is cutting customer churn by 50%.

items.name: Bald & Grey Hair
items.description:
We automate asset trading with AI.

This is how we can adapt to market changes efficiently and accordingly. Managing an automated portfolio of validated strategies helps us to avoid human biases and achieve more sustainable and reliable returns.

We are a team of aspiring financial engineers and statisticians with a courageous mindset. Our vision is to combine the power of algorithms and state of the art statistical innovation with financial markets.

items.name: Work Pilots Oy
items.shortDescription: WorkPilots, mobile on-demand job matching platform
items.description: WorkPilots is a unique mobile-first service that connects young people in need of work with households, companies and organizations which can utilize youth to handle their seasonal, on-demand and sporadic tasks (so-called gigs). WorkPilots approach is building social impact. Organizations can easily find motivated workers at a fair price, young people gain access into the workplace, and at the same time, a positive social impact to combat youth unemployment is created.

items.name: Mobile Wellness Solutions MWS Oy
items.description: Wellmo is a b2b SaaS company driving the preventive digital health megatrend in insurance business and other selected segments. Our solution is a content agnostic platform enabling branded and differentiated health app leveraging local health content and services. This platform & ecosystem approach is gaining increasing traction on the market. Wellmo has paying customers in 5 European countries and is on a solid growth track at close to 100% p.a. for the third year.

items.name: Funzilife Oy

Funzi’s mission is to provide everyone access to quality learning cost effectively, and to deliver the best learning experience on mobile - with little or no cost to the end-user.

items.name: Helpten Oy

In Finland we are having as our customers and partners big car dealers, Santander, Lähitapiola, Elisa, ABC, Falck. 2019 we aim to expand to  countries in Europe. We seek funding for expansion

items.name: Mapple Analytics Oy

By applying insights on people, infrastructure and mobility they can evaluate current situation and forecast the impact of their investment. Our team is made of GIS experts, data scientists and growth hackers. We are currently looking for partners, new customers and first seed investment.

items.name: Solar Water Solutions Oy
items.shortDescription: MAKE DRINKING WATER WITH  ZERO EMISSIONS
items.description:
We run on solar, we run off-grid.
We run on solar, no diesel needed.
We run on solar, sunshine doesn't cost a penny.
Make drinking water with zero emissions. Revolutionary SolarRO-system helps you to produce safe and affordable water locally in remote locations. You'll avoid the transport of water and bottled water. Potable water can be made directly from seawater, lakes, rivers, ponds or boreholes.
The products are mobile and scalable to suit your capacity requirements. Powered fully by solar.
